articles.title: Owen Farrell caught out on live TV in interview gaffe

articles.title: England errors are fixable but disjointed attack the biggest worry after shock Argentina defeat
articles.description: Eddie Jones did not even put up a fight. The natural-born combatant rejected any verbal sparring, put down his guard and accepted that England only had themselves to blame for “elementary mistakes”.

articles.title: World Cup referee Facundo Tello dishes out 10 red cards in Argentina's Champions Trophy final
articles.description: In all, seven red cards were shown to Boca players and three from Racing over the course of Sunday's match.
articles.content:
World Cup referee Facundo Tello warmed up for the tournament by dishing out 10 red cards in Argentina's Champions Trophy final.
Sunday's game descended into chaos after Racing Club midfielder Carlos Alcaraz sparked a melee in front of the Boca Junior... [689 chars]

articles.title: Argentina drought casts shadow over crop yields
articles.description: Soybean and corn planting are underway in South America where the weather has been cooperative for some but difficult for others. Argentina’s growing regions have faced unfavorable weather.
articles.content:
Soybean and corn planting are well underway in South America where the weather has been cooperative for some but difficult for others. Argentina’s growing regions have largely faced unfavorable weather thus far this planting season.

articles.title: Soccer-Referee hands out 10 red cards in fiery Argentine final
articles.description:
World Cup referee Facundo Tello dished out 10 red cards in Argentina's Champions Trophy final on Sunday after Racing Club midfielder Carlos Alcaraz sparked a melee in front of the Boca Juniors fans with his match-winning goal celebration.
Norberto Briasco had opened the scoring for Boca before Racing's Matias Rojas equalised in the first half.
